FlowGraph
Table of Contents

Class InputNodeProcessor<T>

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

A simple processor for nodes that only output values (no processing needed). Use this for input nodes like color pickers, sliders, text inputs, etc.

public class InputNodeProcessor<T> : NodeProcessor, INodeProcessor

Type Parameters

T

The type of value this node outputs.
